Posts.Content: sjstrader820 wrote: After having a mastectomy in July, I am now concerned with a swelling above and below my incision. From what I can read I'm guessing it's because of all of my lymph nodes were taken out. Should I be calling the surgeon? I am not scheduled until October. Could there be something wrong? Dx 5/25/2010, IDC, 1cm, Stage I, Grade 2, 0/12 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: After Mastectomy Swelling sjstrader820 Marly
